name: Stream On
description:
This interactive p5.js piece generates a variety of streamers and confetti-like swirls that are guaranteed to improve your day!** Here, you click and think and click and stare and help make the art.

If you are using Safari on MacOS or iOS, everything is going to be slow at first. Click once and it will tell Safari that you're interested in seeing things as they were meant to be and it will speed up.

On Desktop:

- Click once to add additional streamers to the current composition
- Double-click to start a new random composition.
- Press the space bar to export the current frame as a png image. You might need to be in full screen mode.
- Share your stuff on Twitter and tag me @clayheaton because I love seeing it. :)

On Mobile:

- Tap once with a single appendage to add additional streamers
- Tap once with two appendages simultaneously and the piece might reset to start a new random composition. If it doesn't, try again a few times. If that fails, refresh the page. I promise that I tried to make this work properly.




** Guarantee not guaranteed.
